casebody.data:
QUIET REFLECTIONS RETREAT, INC., Plaintiff,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, as Trustee FOR the CERTIFICATE HOLDERS OF THE CWALT, INC., ALTERNATIVE LOAN TRUST 2006-5T2 MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2006-5T2, Defendant. No. COA17-887 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: April 17, 2018

VACATED IN PART. REVERSED AND REMANDED IN PART. DISMISSED IN PART.
